author: LinOnetwo
description: Use github as your image storage, add _canonical_uri to all image, pointing to raw.github
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/ControlPanel/Settings.css":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/ControlPanel/Settings.css","text":".itkg-setting-tags-item input {
  margin-left: 5px;
  padding: 2px;
} ","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/github-external-image/ControlPanel/Settings":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/github-external-image/ControlPanel/Settings","caption":"GithubPagesImage","tags":"$:/tags/ControlPanel/SettingsTab","text":"!!! [[Repo|$:/GitHub/Repo]]

This is the user name + / + repo name, e.g. `linonetwo/wiki`

<$edit-text tiddler="$:/GitHub/Repo" field="text" tag=input class="w-100" />

!!! [[Branch|$:/GitHub/Branch]]

This usually is `master` or `main`

<$edit-text tiddler="$:/GitHub/Branch" field="text" tag=input class="w-100" />

!!! [[tiddler-folder-name|$:/config/linonetwo/github-external-image/tiddler-folder-name]]

This usually is just `tiddlers`

<$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/linonetwo/github-external-image/tiddler-folder-name" field="text" tag=input class="w-100" />"},"$:/core/templates/canonical-uri-external-image":{"title":"$:/core/templates/canonical-uri-external-image","created":"20200412025117549","creator":"LinOnetwo","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<!--

This template is used to assign the ''_canonical_uri'' field to external images.

Change the `./images/` part to a different base URI. The URI can be relative or absolute.

-->
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/{{$:/GitHub/Repo}}/{{$:/GitHub/Branch}}/{{$:/config/linonetwo/github-external-image/tiddler-folder-name}}/<$view field="title" format="urlencoded"/>"},"$:/GitHub/Branch":{"title":"$:/GitHub/Branch","text":"master"},"$:/config/linonetwo/github-external-image/tiddler-folder-name":{"title":"$:/config/linonetwo/github-external-image/tiddler-folder-name","text":"tiddlers"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/github-external-image/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/github-external-image/readme","creator":"LinOnetwo","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"!! Usage

Please fill in [[$:/GitHub/Repo]] and [[$:/config/linonetwo/github-external-image/tiddler-folder-name]] in settings to get started:

[[Settings|$:/plugins/linonetwo/github-external-image/ControlPanel/Settings]]

Then, on build, all images will be replaced by place holders.

Please use following build target:

```json
"externalimages": [
  "--setfield",
  "[is[binary]] [type[application/msword]]",
  "_canonical_uri",
  "$:/core/templates/canonical-uri-external-image",
  "text/plain",
  "--setfield",
  "[is[binary]] [type[application/msword]]",
  "text",
  "$:/core/templates/canonical-uri-external-image",
  "text/plain",
  "--rendertiddler",
  "$:/core/save/all",
  "index.html",
  "text/plain"
],
```
"}}}
title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/github-external-image
name: github-external-image
